body:
Comment 8 by **wmundt42**: 
I think it would be neat to be able to say:

  rvchan := make(chan bool)
  rvchan <- go boolFunc(); // nonblocking, arranges for result of boolFunc to go in
rvchan

  // later...
  rv := <- rvchan;

That resolves the channel type issue and the creation of an unnecessary channel
issue.  You might even shorthand it to:

  rvchan := <- go someFunc();
  // ...
  rv := <- rvchan;
